title: Dojang manifest
description: Dojang manifest (so-called dojang.toml) is a TOML file that describes a Dojang repository.

routeMap.title: Route definitions
routeMap.description: A map of route names to their corresponding route definitions.

additionalProperties.title: Route definition
additionalProperties.description: A route definition which describes how to copy files/directories from the source to the destination for certain environments.

additionalProperties.title: File path expression
additionalProperties.description: A file path expression which represents a destination path.  It can contain expandable variables.

environmentPredicate.title: Environment predicate
environmentPredicate.description: An environment predicate which describes criteria for environments.

os.title: OS criteria
os.description: OS criteria that are satisfied if one of the OS identifiers matches.

arch.title: Process architecture criteria
arch.description: Process architecture criteria that are satisfied if one of the architecture identifiers matches.

kernel.title: Kernel name criteria
kernel.description: Kernel name criteria that are satisfied if one of the kernel name identifiers matches.

kernel-release.title: Kernel version criteria
kernel-release.description: Kernel version criteria that are satisfied if one of the kernel version identifiers matches.

any.title: Monikers criteria (OR condition)
any.description: Monikers criteria that are satisfied if any of the moniker is satisfied.

all.title: Monikers criteria (AND condition)
all.description: Monikers criteria that are satisfied if all of the monikers are satisfied.

when.title: Advanced environment predicate syntax
when.description: Advanced environment predicate syntax that allows to specify a more complex condition.

osList.title: OS identifier(s)
osList.description: An OS identifier or an array of OS identifiers.

os.title: OS identifier
os.description: An OS identifier which is recognized by Dojang.

archList.title: Process architecture identifier(s)
archList.description: A process architecture identifier or an array of process architecture identifiers.

arch.title: Process architecture identifier
arch.description: A process architecture identifier which is recognized by Dojang.

monikerName.title: Moniker name
monikerName.description: A moniker name which defined in the same manifest.

hook.title: Hook definition
hook.description: A hook that runs a custom script before or after the apply command.

command.title: Command path
command.description: The path to the executable to run.

args.title: Command arguments
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command.

when.title: Condition
when.description: An environment predicate expression that determines when this hook runs.

working-directory.title: Working directory
working-directory.description: The working directory for the hook. Defaults to the repository directory.

ignore-failure.title: Ignore failure
ignore-failure.description: If true, continues even if the hook exits with a non-zero status.

ignores.title: Ignore patterns
ignores.description: A map of route names to their corresponding ignore patterns.

items.title: Ignore pattern (glob)
items.description: A glob pattern that is used to ignore destination files/directories.

monikers.title: Moniker definitions
monikers.description: A map of moniker names to their corresponding environment predicates.

hooks.title: Hook definitions
hooks.description: Hooks that run custom scripts before and after the apply command.

pre-apply.title: Pre-apply hooks
pre-apply.description: Hooks that run before every apply, before file sync.

pre-first-apply.title: Pre-first-apply hooks
pre-first-apply.description: Hooks that run only on first apply, before file sync.

post-first-apply.title: Post-first-apply hooks
post-first-apply.description: Hooks that run only on first apply, after file sync.

post-apply.title: Post-apply hooks
post-apply.description: Hooks that run after every apply, after file sync.
